content.title: Welcome to Keesu
content.content:
Keesu is a private osu server powered by ruri which is bancho that safe, fast for Korean.
You can check out more features here. Keesu has Korean based community and its open source!

leaderboards.title: Leaderboard
leaderboards.description: Taiko, CTB, Mania is currently not supported for pp. Score will still be saved for future calculations.

content.title: Welcome to Keesu :D
content.content: Before you get started, you must login or register if you don't already have an account.

form.alreadyread: I already read Terms and Conditions

error.1: Username should be only english and numbers.
error.2: Your Username Length must higher 3 Characters!
error.3: Your Username Length must lower than 15 Characters!
error.4: is not a valid email address!
error.5: We are currently whitelisted Naver Mail only.
error.6: Your Password Must Contain At Least 8 Characters!
error.7: Your Password Must Contain At Least 1 Lowercase Letter!
error.8: Please Check You're Entered or confirmed Your Password!
error.9: Please agree the Term Of Conditions!
error.10: Sorry, Currently IP Services are down. Try again later.
error.11: Sorry, The Server is Korean only. You can only register at South Korea.
error.13: Wait, You are multiaccounting on same ip! If you have any questions, tell us at discord server.
error.14:
There is same username/email on Server!
But it is not verified, so look at your emails!
error.15: There is same username/email on Server!

mysql.noconnect: Couldn't connect to database. Please try again later.
